trans-unit.source: Specifies whether, and where, a printer staples a multi-page document.
trans-unit.target: Anger om, och om en skrivare häftklamrar flera sidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - As members of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A> collection, which is a property of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, these values indicate the types of stapling that a printer supports.
trans-unit.target: Använd värdena för den här typen främst för dessa ändamål: - som medlemmar i den <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A>samling, som är en egenskap för <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, dessa värden anger vilka typer av häftning att en skrivare stöder.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.StaplingCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: - As the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, the value instructs the printer whether, and where, to staple.
trans-unit.target: -Som värde för den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A>egenskapen för en <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, värdet instruerar skrivaren om, och där, för häftning.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Unknown` value is never used in properties of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den `Unknown` värde används aldrig i egenskaperna för <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>objekt.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: You should never set a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> property to `Unknown`.

If some other <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the stapling feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object in your application that is constructed with that document will have `Unknown` as the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om vissa andra <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>producerar programmet har skapat en *PrintTicket dokument* som anger Funktionshäftning till ett okänt alternativ (som är ett alternativ som inte har definierats i den [utskrifts schemat](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), och sedan en <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>objekt i ditt program som skapats med dokumentet har `Unknown` som värde för den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.Stapling%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes.
trans-unit.target: Även om den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>och <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>klasser kan inte ärvas, kan du utöka den [ut schemat](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) att identifiera utskriftsenhet funktioner som inte ingår i den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>eller <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>klasser.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [NOTINBUILD: Så här: utöka utskrifts-schemat och skapa nya utskrifts systemklasser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).

trans-unit.source: The document is not stapled.
To be added.
Multiple staples along the fold line.
Also called saddle-stitch stapling.
To be added.
A single staple in the lower-left corner.
trans-unit.target: En enda klammer i det nedre vänstra hörnet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A single staple in the lower-right corner.
trans-unit.target: En enda klammer i det nedre högra hörnet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Two staples along the lower edge.
To be added.

To be added.
Two staples along the right edge.
To be added.
Two staples along the upper edge.
To be added.
A single staple in the upper-left corner.
trans-unit.target: En enda klammer i det övre vänstra hörnet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A single staple in the upper-right corner.
trans-unit.target: En enda klammer i det övre högra hörnet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: Funktionen (som alternativ representeras av den här uppräkningen) har angetts till ett alternativ som inte har definierats i den [utskrifts schemat](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
